story.synopsys: In the year 3669, amidst the splendor and innovation of a world consumed by technology, a murder mystery deepens the enigma surrounding mankind's elusive pursuit of eternity. In a sprawling metropolis known as Eternity, where humans have transcended physical limitations and exist in a state of eternal consciousness, a renowned scientist is found lifeless in his opulent laboratory. The circumstances shrouding his demise are eerie, with no sign of forced entry or struggle. As the clock ticks with a robotic rhythm, it becomes clear that this murder disrupts the tranquil facade of perpetual existence. Prying into the secrets of this grand society, a detective from the past must navigate the labyrinthine web of suspects, each possessing their own motive for extinguishing a beacon of scientific brilliance. And so, shadows of doubt are cast upon the supposedly immortal residents, questioning the invulnerability of the very fabric of their existence. As ancient human emotion intertwines with futuristic technology, the hunt for the truth unearths a deeper conspiracy, threatening the delicate equilibrium of Eternity itself.
